titles.title: A bill to provide a permanent deduction for States and local general sales taxes.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 447.

bill.summary:
10/25/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the tax deduction for state and local general sales taxes.
